overview: The titles of this mini series are inspired by true events in Budapest between 1992 and 1993. In 1995 the Hungarian crime reports the arrest of a doctor and his assistant for sexual violence, committed in the unaware patients harm. The tactic used was to inject a benzodiazepine drug of class with active flunitrazepam ingredient, getting a hypnotic, anxiolytic and sedative effect that made the victims sexual slaves of the doctor.
title: Medical Center
